tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was my first pregnancy ,we had tried for 2.5 years n consulted 3 doctors before I met her, she listened to our problems and advice us what treatment has to be done, she is experienced, knowledgable abt treating the patient. She unnecessarily won't prescribed additional pills.she is friendly approachable at any time and answers all my queries in cl and WhatsApp though. Unnecessarily she won't ask to come to clinic for consultation.During delivery time i tried for normal but due change of baby position she advised  to go for c section n i trusted her and we r blessed with baby girl. I thankfull to Dr vaani mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of having Dr. Vani as our obstetrician for the delivery of our baby. From our very first appointment to the moment my baby was born, Dr. Vani demonstrated exceptional professionalism, compassion, and expertise.
I am deeply grateful for Dr. Vani’s dedication and care. She made what could have been a stressful experience into a positive and memorable one. I highly recommend Dr. Vani to any expectant mother seeking a skilled and compassionate obstetrician. Thank you, Dr. Vani for your outstanding care!
reply_text: Thanks dear. May god bless you and your baby

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: The doctor is friendly and responds quickly. Creates a safe and comfortable environment. Easy to communicate. Incase of emergency, Vani ma'am responds quickly. I'm very much satisfied with the treatment and care. I hv personally and definitely recommend Dr. Vani.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very friendly and well  treatment given by her. I will alway suggest others to go for her consultation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Vani is truly an exceptional doctor and we are absolutely grateful for her support. She is extremely knowledgeable, great with diagnosis and treatment plans. She explains each and every small question of the patient with utmost kindness. We travelled all the way from Whitefield because it's totally worth it. I was misdiagnosed with an uterine polyp by another doctor because of which we were stressed out for nearly 2 months and within one visit Dr.Vani confirmed that there was no polyp whatsoever. Highly recommended her. She's the best :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.vani madam is really a wonderful person,i am blessed that i have gone through under madam exceptional treatment.Vani madam is friendly communcative doctor,she will listen patients concerns very carefully with patience.She was always available on phone whenever I needed her support and we will get the response as quickly as possible. Having such dedicated and selfless doctors in today's world is a blessing.There was too many complications in my pregnancy since last 3 years, but Vani madam managed very professionally with her valuable experience.After 6 years now we got the precious gift, thank you so much madam from bottom of our hearts for good care and guidence and making my pregnancy journey a smooth one, as it wouldn't have been possible without your support.
reply_text: Thank you very much much dear.may god bless you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Would recommend Dr Vani to all the pregnant ladies out there or planning to be pregnant . Please find my review : 

1) A lot of positiveness in the treatment . 
2) No unnecessary treatment or medications suggested , but all necessary tests were done and taken care . 
3) During covid and non COVID I would suggest this doctor’s clinic , as all tests , growth scans , medicines provided were done at the same place, need not travel several places , whereas other clinics I have seen this issue . 
4) Any time Dr Vani is available to attend your concerns , just whats App her . 
5) I had a normal delivery , with all her support and guidance. No hurry in delivering . 
6) Did suggest me the best things during my pregnancy , she was my second mom during my pregnancy as my mom was in US for my initial pregnancy months . 
7) Dr Vani does not fear you out with any health issues if you have any …, whereas other few doctors I have seen and heard they really fear you out. 
8) I personally was in search of a friendly gynaecologist, which I saw in Dr Vani , very soft spoken. This really matters as your hormones would be changing during pregnancy .  I had bad experience earlier with other gynaecologist who was rude.

When my pregnancy was detected , just saw her commendable experience and reviews of others through Practo and did visit her and indeed was the best decision of my life . Her visit timings were very comfortable for a working women . During delivery , she was in constant contact with OT doctors and guiding them the necessary steps .  My smooth pregnancy and delivery  credit goes to the doctor .
reply_text: Disha how i wish all my patients were like you, absolutely simple, hasslefree and trusting. Because of this nature you had a smooth and easy pregnancy and delivery.my blessings to baby. Thanks for the lovely feedback.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It has been a great journey with Dr. Vani. I visited her for pregnancy and post delivery care.She is very friendly and she answers all the queries with patience.She asks to call her in case of any emergency. She attended our call  and replied messages in time whenever i was in need during my pregnancy. She has provided utmost care of our safety during pandemic. She never prescribed any unnecessary test and medication.  She helped me to deliver my angel safely .I am always thankful to madam for bringing happiness in our life.She has always behaved like a family member .Post delivery recovery was quick..So many times i was having some queries and anxiety but madam has made me feel relaxed with her positive attitude.
She also suggested me the hospital for my delivery.Thank you for suggesting such a good hospital. As promised by her ,she managed to provide all sort of facilities needed for newborn and mother at the hospital. I want to say a big  thanks to  hospital staff members and the doctors  who coordinated very well . It gave me a complete homely care.  No doubt she is going to be my lifetime gynic..I would highly recommend her to my friends and family members.
Thank you madam for everything. We wish her all the success. Thank you once again madam from the core of my heart.
reply_text: So sweet of you Kiran.god bless you and your family

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I highly recommend Dr.Vani for all the women. I consulted her for my second pregnancy. First time I took a video consultation with doctor thru Practo. She answered all the questions I had. I was very much satisfied.  I was a covid recovered patient when I consulted Dr.Vani. I made sure I was fully cured before visiting the hospital.She never prescribed any unnecessary tests or medication. All the necessary medications, blood tests, scans were taken care on time.I was always worried about each and everything, but Dr.Vani's words made me calm. She is very cool and confident.After going thru all the physical and mental stress because of covid during pregnancy, finding Dr.Vani was a relief to us. I was not able to go thru normal delivery this time due to some medical reason. And this was a planned c-section and Dr.Vani handled it so well. She is accessible thru WhatsApp for any clarification about the tests and  reports.She answered all my doubts and queries in every visit.I delivered in the last week of December. Our family is always greatful to Dr.Vani for bringing our little princess into this world safely.Thank you doctor :)
reply_text: Thanks supreet. God bless the little princess.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant,Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Scan,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review: I blessed  to have Dr Vani  through out my pregnancy and delivery. She is such a  positive soul and that made me to have  complete trust on her.this was my first pregnancy and my parents r so happy  we came to Dr Vani due to pandemic they were not here but they happy n satisfied  as I'm in a safe hands.had a emergency  c section and she took decision on right time and with lot of confidence. Well I too got confidence  when I use to listen  her.Mam really a heartfelt thanks to u made my pregnancy so easy and comfortable. Whenever I visited  to u I never  felt going to meet a doctor  rather a family  person which is one of the most  important  thing to have that freeness to express self.one of the best thing is she is always  available  and her prompt  response made my pregnancy  more comfortable. She is confident, dedicated, supportive, caring,humble , a great  motivater.No doubt she is my lifetime  gynic. I pray  God for her whole  worlds  happiness and health.I highly recommend Dr Vani for gynic and pregnancy related issues. No doubt  she one of the best gynic  in Bangalore. A big thanks from me and my family. Lots of love and good wishes to my favorite doctor ❤♥

We Consulted Dr.Vani for entire 9 months of my pregnancy, we finally blessed with a healthy baby boy on jan 13th under the supervision of Dr. Vani, From the starting  she guided us for healthy mother will have a healthy baby concept. In this entire period, I feel blessed with the support, guidance, care and the empathy of Dr.Vani,I recommend her to all my friends and relatives. Whenever I visited Dr. Vani I felt a new positivity and my energy level automatically gone up, In the beginning of my pregnancy there were times when I feel very nervous and low and I will give Dr. Vani all the credit for giving me the strength, positivity and utmost care, she treats all her patients like a family member and gives all great advises with a big smile. I strongly recommended all to be moms to visit Dr.Vani 
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
*** **** ** ** ********* ******* She provided utmost care and support for my pregnancy. I felt extremely comfortable asking her any questions and she was also available at any time over the phone. For my ANC checkups she accommodated us for weekends so that we are not inconvenienced during the work week.

Dr. Vani is very reasonable and doesn’t prescribe unnecessary medications or restrictions, dietary or otherwise. She gave me full confidence to manage my pregnancy and that I can continue to work until the very end. 

Thank you Dr. Vani for all your support & guidance. There is no other Ob-Gyn that I trust in Bangalore and that alone is a sole testament of her abilities and her caring attitude.
reply_text: Thanks lakshmi. May God bless you and baby

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I contacted Dr Vani in 6th month of my pregnancy as got transferred to Bangalore..and I must mention that she is very reassuring about every anxiety one goes through during pregnancy.
She politely answers every query and is expert in her field.
The thing I love about her is that in case of emergency, she is reachable on whatsapp and calls for her patients at all times. She is gentle and considerate and I am very thankful to her for guiding me throughout my pregnancy, delivery and post delivery. I would recommend her to anyone looking for a gynae for a smooth and successful pregnancy journey.
reply_text: Thanks dear Prashasti. So sweet of you dear.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Vani ma'am was recommended to us by my mom's friend Dr. Sathyaprabha. From my first visit, Vani ma'am has been very friendly, she will explain things in detail and make us understand better. She encouraged me to undergo vaginal delivery. On the day of delivery also, she was constantly in touch with the doctors and visited me during labour many times. I delivered within 6hrs, without epidural, and ma'am did the delivery with utmost care. Postnatal visits were also very comfortable. I would 100% recommend visiting her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

She has given us our world and happiness.Everything went well with my pregnancy because she took care of everything. Post delivery recovery was good.Thank you so much Doctor! To attain motherhood wouldn't have been possible without you. 🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had visited Dr. Vani for my pregnancy check up and delivery of the baby.
She answered all my queries and was always available on whatsapp for any questions that I had.
She kept me on positive note through out my pregnancy.
I was least anxious about the pregnancy because of her positive approach towards the treatment.

I had to get into an emergency C section as my baby had passed meconium. Confidence in Dr. Vani helped me keep my calm during the procedure. I delivered a healthy baby girl!
During my stay at the hospital Dr. Vani visited me daily. 
And yet again her positive approach boosts the confidence of the patient.
I highly recommend the doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My name is Prema Vittal and I am extremely happy with Dr. Vani! I am pregnant for the 2nd time, unfortunately had a miscarriage the first time. Dr. Vani has been guiding me very accurately with extra care and caution this time! 

I have been very anxious because of what happened last time but Dr. Vani has been extremely supportive. Her immediate whatsapp responses are as quick as a lighting which constantly gives me assurance that I am in safe hands and I can completely trust her. I would recommend her to all my friends plus make her my gyno in future too if need be!
reply_text: Thanks prema for the lovely feedback.  You made my day.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I would strongly like to recommend Dr. Vani to other patients out there. *** ** **** ************* *** committed towards her work. Her level of professionalism and expertise helps her to keep her work organised. Somewhere I felt she could extent her professionlism merging with little friendliness for patients who are visiting for first time, this may help develop good rapport. Other than this, she is perfect and dedicated one. I would extent my heart full of gratitude for letting me complete my pregnancy in d midst of covid. She did risk her life to help me deliver a new life. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We Have been visiting Dr. Vani.R for a year now for gynaec problems. I must say we'r most lucky that we found her for my pregnancy and delivery. She is MOST efficient and highly professional doctor I have ever met.. She is such an amazing person that how much ever I express here is lesser. She is very dedicated, highly punctual, always positive and practical. she doesn't suggest any unwanted tests/medicines.And whenever I have any doubt irrespective of the time she is reachable on phone which is a great plus..My confident level and hope increases when I met dr. Vani R and very much satisfied with the experience i would strongly recommend dr Vani R for any gynaecology problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would recommend Dr.Vani to any pregnant women or women with gynec issues.  She is extremely passionate about her job, keeps things very simple. She explains things in detail and promotes natural delivery.  Dr. Vani prescribed very few medications, suggested exercises throughout the course of my pregnancy.   Now I have delivered a full term baby girl without any complications.  Not just that she is very responsive on WhatsApp etc for any clarifications or medical advice.I would rate her 5/5 for her skill, approach, and passion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: Dr Vani handled my pregnancy care, delivery and post op with finesse. She is a caring, thoughtful medical professional and a patient listener regardless of how silly my doubts or concerns were. Towards my 35th week when I developed persistent trouble with my BP and sugar for which we could not find a root cause, she took a calculated decision to deliver my baby early (exactly 36 weeks), for which I am extremely grateful to her since we discovered after he was born that he had already passed meconium in-utero. I trust her judgment, and would recommend her to all moms-to-be looking for a good obstetrician around Banashankari, especially if you have had a gynec history such as a myomectomy or laparoscopy.
reply_text: Thanks for the lovely feedback tanya

review:
Without Dr Vani Madam, we wouldn’t have had the baby who had less chances of survival due to cervical length issue. We were running to many hospitals to find a Dr who would give us hope, and by gods grace we ended up meeting Vani Madam.

God must have known that only Vani Madam can save our baby, so he had send us to her despite we had booked appointment for different Dr who was not available and then we met madam. We are forever thankful for excellent treatment, care and the way Dr owns the patient is commendable, despite some huddles. Dr was available 24/7 for any query, some were silly though. One should literally be blessed to get a Dr like Vani Madam, especially during such complications.
We are forever thankful to Madam 🙏🏻.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I consulted Dr Vani R for my gynaecology issue. She did listen patiently to me and suggested me several  non surgical options. Later, when surgery became imminent, even though I had multiple gynac issues which could have led to complications during surgery, she managed to do a 
laproscopic surgery on me as against  other methods. This enabled me to recover early and I am thankful to her for that.
  
I felt safe in her hands and she was also available on WhatsApp when I needed her.

I would  highly recommend Dr Vani R to others since she came across to me as an approachable and humane doctor with profound commitment and dedication to her profession apart from being  known as a skilled laproscopic surgeon.

review:

reply_text: Dear verified patient, you have booked online appointment 30 to 40minutes before and you expect me to be ontime. How do we manage our emergency offline consultations ? . If we are in middle of an emergency surgery then how do we manage? . Despite my problems i stopped offline consultation in the middle and attended to you.  Please have empathy for doctors.  You have to stand in our shoes and understand. Also i did not get any reminder call from practo. Please book appointments atleast 2 to 3 hours prior or the previous day to avoid inconvenience. Ours is nòt general practice or a speciality where there are no emergencies. Anytime patients can walk in labour. Cant give priority  to online non emergency patients.
